title: Looking for gold/plat teams or higher to scrim against
body:
If anyone is apart of a team and wants to organise some scrims please message me on here or add me (IGN HardWired) in game so we can get organised. My team is looking to que up some scrims on week nights around 7-10. If your interested get back to me and my team can give you a good match. 

Thanks.

replies.body:
im plat5 wouldnt mind being part of some scrims if you need players, im a jungle main but can top also. 

danymac89
Hey Danny thanks for the offer but am more looking for scrims against organised 5 man's so my team can come up against new strats and playstyles so we won't be putting together teams to vs. Sorry.

Nope, Add me in game and let's organise a scrim
IGN: HardWired
